======Displays debug messages for alien ignited/exploded to marine.======

= Description =

Displays a debug message whenever marine has ignited/exploded by alien melee/touch. 
{|
|| [[asw_version.wiki|Server Version]] Added || Default || [[CvarFlags.wiki | CvarFlags]] || [ParamType Parameter Type] 
|-
|| 2.0 || `0` || [[FCVAR_NONE.wiki|FCVAR_NONE]] || [Bool] 
|}

==== Examples: ====
*Player xxxxx has ignited  by shieldbug knockdown
*Player xxxxx has exploded by shieldbug knockdown
